title: Lenovo's Smart Assistant home hub is here – and it's got Alexa smarts | Trusted Reviews
description: ![LenovoSmart]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * In terms of other hardware variances over its inspiration, the Smart Assistanthas eight far-field microphones around the top ring compared to the Echo’sseven.The idea is for the assistant to be able to pick up commands from anywhere inthe room.The standard versions are available in light gray, green and orange, while theHarmon Kardon Edition is black. All will go on sale in May, although UK priceand availability are yet to be confirmed.**Amazon Echo review****Is Lenovo about to beat Amazon at its own game? Share your thoughts below.**
